thread.title: Great Location in Financial District
thread.title_full: Great Location in Financial District - Review of Millenium Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Gail G
title: Great Location in Financial District
text:
We were fortunate to stay in the Mayoral suite on the 55th floor. Gorgeous views. Very
spacious and clean. It was a great experience. Right across the street from the 9/11 memorial and brand new subway station that has a great ma..
Room Tip: rooms on the high level provide a great view. See more room tips Green Features: Recycle, water conservation are all practiced at this hotel.
